definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
can be rated as/can be said to be
to be unable to withstand a single blow/to collapse at the first blow
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma

pinyin: Si1 kan1 di4 na4 wei2 ya4

sentences.english: I worked with the patience of a redwood growing rings.
sentences.chinese: 我这种耐心，堪与红杉树长年轮媲美。

sentences.english: A good dictionary is always readable, like P. O. D.
sentences.chinese: 像POD这样的好词典总是总是颇堪一读的。

sentences.english: A good dictionary is always readable, like the P. O. D.
sentences.chinese: 好的字典和袖珍牛津字典，都是颇堪一读的。

sentences.english: China's Type 055 destroyer as good as US Zumwalt-class destroyer?
sentences.chinese: 中国055型驱逐舰堪比美科幻战舰？

sentences.english: Children who live nearby earn money digging through the debris to find salvageable material.
sentences.chinese: 住在附近的儿童从废墟中寻找堪回收的材料卖钱。

sentences.english: It’s easy to have your scheme look like a rainbow if you aren’t careful.
sentences.chinese: 一不小心，你的方案会花得堪比彩虹。

sentences.english: Humphreys will protect towel comb, not only impervious to dust.
sentences.chinese: 堪将护巾栉，不独隔尘埃。

sentences.english: Yellow purple crab can bring wine, mangrove good castle on a vessel.
sentences.chinese: 黄鸡紫蟹堪携酒，红树青山好放船。

sentences.english: The tree has grown much taller than before.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树比页堪菠得高多了。

sentences.english: Bras are engineering challenges that have been compared in the industry to suspension bridges.
sentences.chinese: 文胸所体现的工程学原理堪与吊桥相比。

sentences.english: Can the beautiful rivers and mountains, clear water ripples, is a single reward, a thin people do.
sentences.chinese: 堪那河山秀丽，碧水涟漪，也是一人独赏，一人瘦尽。

sentences.english: She appears in action movies, so gets paid like the guys.
sentences.chinese: 她出演动作片，得到的片酬也堪比男明星。

definition: heavy load/heavy burden (also fig. of tax)
to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
